import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../home/Home.css'; import Sidebar from '../sidebar/sidebar'; import ModalList from './ModalList'; import { Button, Modal, ButtonToolbar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from '../sidebar/header'; import { string, any, number } from 'prop-types'; var NAME_OBJ: any class Customer extends React.Component { constructor(props:any) { super(props); this.state = { data: [], setShow: false, isClose: true, NAME_OBJ: string, ID_OBJ: any, ID_OGR: number }; this.dataListCustomer= this.dataListCustomer.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { fetch('http://www.o-nolimit.com/Admin/Api/Customer/LoadCustomers') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ data })) .catch(e => { console.log(e); return e; }); } handleSubmit(event:any){ event.preventDefault(); fetch('http://www.o-nolimit.com/Admin/Api/Customer/InsertCustomerApi', { method: 'post', headers: {'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(this.state.data) }); console.log(JSON.stringify(this.state.data)) }; dataListCustomer() { return( this.state.data.map(function(item: any, i: any){ return(
{item.ID_OBJ}
{item.NAME_OBJ}
{item.ID_OGR}
) }) ) } render(){ const styleshow = { display: this.state.setShow ? "block" : "none" } console.log(this.state.data) return (
